# Switching To Mangomint

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/switching-to-mangomint/

## Category
01 Getting Started

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
GETTING STARTED
SETTING UP YOUR ACCOUNT
Switching to Mangomint

When switching to Mangomint from a previous scheduling software, our team works with you to make the process as easy and seamless as possible.

Your dedicated Onboarding Manager will guide you through the entire onboarding process and answer any questions you have along the way. Your Onboarding Manager oversees your entire onboarding process, including helping you with your onboarding tasks and data import.

Link copied
Overview

Here’s what you can expect when switching to Mangomint:

Select Try it now on our website to start your free trial of Mangomint. You can also select Book a demo on our website to see Mangomint in action and chat with one of our product experts.

Discuss data import with your dedicated Onboarding Manager and get your onboarding questions answered.

Finish setting up your Mangomint account. You can find detailed information on how to set up your account here. If you need help or have any questions, contact us anytime.

Begin scheduling with Mangomint, and make sure to start your subscription before your free trial ends.

Link copied
Notify your clients about your switch to Mangomint

When you’re ready, consider notifying your clients about your new scheduling software. You can choose to notify clients at a time that works best for you, whether it's a week before your launch or the day of your launch.

The Campaigns app includes a New Software Announcement email template that you can use to notify your clients about your switch to Mangomint.

Our Canva Template How-To is available to download and includes steps on how to create Instagram assets in Canva to announce your switch to Mangomint.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
